mapper.insert: insert into dictionary (dictionary_id, dictionary_name, one_id, two_id) values (#{dictionaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictionaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{twoId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into dictionary
dictionary_id,
dictionary_name,
one_id,
two_id,
#{dictionaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dictionaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{oneId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{twoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update dictionary
dictionary_name = #{dictionaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
one_id = #{oneId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
two_id = #{twoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where dictionary_id = #{dictionaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dictionary_name,dictionary_id from dictionary where two_id IN('11100','11200','11300','11400','11500','11600','11700','11800','11900')
select dictionary_name,dictionary_id from dictionary where one_id=19000
select dictionary_name,dictionary_id from dictionary where one_id=21000
